body_html: Re: ABI incompatibility -- our extension interface will have to deal with this, and we will probably want to keep it 'experimental' until we understand better what to do. It doesn't seem feasible to thread everything through a C API to get ABI compatibility.
body_text: Re: ABI incompatibility -- our extension interface will have to deal with this, and we will probably want to keep it 'experimental' until we understand better what to do. It doesn't seem feasible to thread everything through a C API to get ABI compatibility.
body: Re: ABI incompatibility -- our extension interface will have to deal with this, and we will probably want to keep it 'experimental' until we understand better what to do. It doesn't seem feasible to thread everything through a C API to get ABI compatibility.
